Class LeaderboardManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.scoring.LeaderboardManager
public class LeaderboardManager extends Object
Manages the game's leaderboard, including saving, loading, and sorting scores. The leaderboard stores a limited number of top scores.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    LeaderboardManager.LeaderboardEntry
    Represents a single entry in the leaderboard, containing player name, score, level, rows cleared, and a timestamp.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

  • Method Details

    • setLeaderboardFileForTesting

      public static void setLeaderboardFileForTesting(String fileName)
      Sets the leaderboard file name for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to use for the leaderboard.

    • getMaxEntries

      public static int getMaxEntries()
      Returns the maximum number of entries allowed in the leaderboard.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of entries.

    • saveScore

      public static void saveScore(String playerName, int score, int level, int rowsCleared)
      Saves a new score entry to the leaderboard. The new entry is added, the leaderboard is re-sorted, and trimmed to MAX_ENTRIES. If the provided playerName is empty or "Player", a unique name will be generated.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player. If empty or "Player", a unique name will be generated.
      score - The score achieved by the player.
      level - The level reached by the player.
      rowsCleared - The number of rows cleared by the player.

    • loadLeaderboard

      public static List<LeaderboardManager.LeaderboardEntry> loadLeaderboard()
      Loads all leaderboard entries from the file.
      Returns:
      A list of LeaderboardEntry objects, sorted by score.

    • clearLeaderboard

      public static void clearLeaderboard()
      Clears all leaderboard entries by deleting the leaderboard file.
